TestGroupDocumentation.Title: maxExclusive5 GetSet Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the content of trees got by unmarshalling of the maxExclusive-5.xsd based XML documents and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a unsignedByte restricted SimpleType with maxExclusive value 255. Various XML documents specify various values in the element.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML unsignedByte maxExclusive-5.xsd, unmarshalled content tree GetSet test
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls maxExclusive-5-1.xml,...,maxExclusive-5-5.xml documents which specify the values 0, 247, 66, 164, 254 for the unsignedByte restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-unsignedByte-maxExclusive-5 element and expects that elemObj.getValue() returns specified in xml value, then invokes elemObj.setValue(short), elemObj.getValue() should return set value.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML unsignedByte maxExclusive-5.xsd GetSet test for dynamically created content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of unsignedByte restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-unsignedByte-maxExclusive-5 type with the values 0, 247, 66, 164, 254 and expects that elemObj.getValue() returns specified values, then invokes elemObj.setValue(short) with various values, elemObj.getValue() should return set values.
